keyPolicies.policyDescription: Describing the efforts to achieve value for money through lowest Council Tax in Greater Manchester and front line services protection.
Highlighting the reduction in crime and the introduction of special constables to keep the area safe.
Emphasizing commitment to environmental cleanliness through green bin collections and litter bin provision.

issues.environment: Green bin collections available all year and introduction of more than 200 new litter bins to keep streets tidy.

images.caption: Image of a person running with children.
Image of a piggy bank and coins representing financial savings.
Image of special constables in discussion.
